resources.string: The dolphins are pink due to their blood capillaries being near the surface of their skin.
The biggest anaconda ever found was 44 inches in girth and 28ft long, with an estimated weight of 500lbs.
Capybara’s never stay too far away from water, because once they sense danger, they dive right in.
Because of its translucent skin, various organs can be seen without the need of x-ray.
Known for being the smallest primates on the earth, considering adults grow to about 20cm.
With its powerful jaws, its capable of biting through a sea turtle’s shell.
Mostly known as bear-monkey and rarely seen because it is a nocturnal creature. They can be kept as house pets, but could potentially carry roundworm parasites.
A macaw’s tongue has a bone and can sometimes mimic human speech.
The hairless tail tips allow for a stronger grip, and their mobile joints allow for easy swinging from branches.
A sloth’s tongue is 10-12 inches long and is mostly used to chew leaves.
